org.apache.archiva.repository.storage

Class FilesystemStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.storage.FilesystemStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryStorage

    public class FilesystemStorage
extends Object
implements RepositoryStorage
    Implementation of RepositoryStorage where data is stored in the filesystem. All files are relative to a given base path. Path values are separated by '/', '..' is allowed to navigate to a parent directory, but navigation out of the base path will lead to a exception.

                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryStorage
        Moves the asset to the given location and returns the asset object for the destination. Moves only assets that belong to the same storage instance. It will throw a IOException if the assets are from differents storage instances.

        Parameters:
